properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued February 9 at 8:42AM PST until February 10 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very steep and hazardous seas 12 to 14 feet.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or cause
damage to vessels.
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for rough seas and consider remaining in port
until hazardous seas subside.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST MONDAY
